alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Salt Lake and southeastern Davis Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Salt Lake, or near Salt Lake City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, Bountiful, Taylorsville, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Emigration Canyon, Millcreek, Salt Lake City International Airport, Canyon Rim, East Millcreek, Sugarhouse and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 301 and 319. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 113 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
